name: Save The Health Service!
description:
Controls:

A,D/Arrow Keys - Move Left/Right

Space Bar - Swing Net

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in the 72hr jam.

I just want to say a massive thank you to ALL of the essential workers around the world keeping us going during these harsh times, you have my admiration, my respect and my love. Thank you.

*DISCLAIMER* I apologize for the aweful SFX, I am really not great with sound :P

On a more fun note, the game has you catching the people leaving their houses before they escape the street (this will give you score) however, if you catch a "THS" (The Health Service) worker then the "THS Healthbar" will deplete (as it would if the pedestrians escape).

Have fun and any feedback is greatly appreciated!
